attributes.action: STOP Rogue MP's and Lords from ending our BREXIT
attributes.background: We the British people voted for our BREXIT from the EU. We are tired of the lies and the spin and we are also tired of TAX payers money being spent on Fighting our BREXIT! BREXIT means OUR EXIT from the EU and the British people decided that this is what they want!

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the views of individual MPs and peers.
